author: Lon.TV
description:
Find an Apple TV on Amazon - https://lon.tv/uhakc (compensated affiliate link) - This is one of the coolest cord cutting features I've seen in years! A new beta of the Channels App on Apple TV and iPad allows for tuning into four over the air television sources simultaneously from an HDHomerun tuner. See more on the Channels App: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIu0SsVEWc6FgTX_nVZnwm1p and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

More Info : https://community.getchannels.com/t/beta-tvos-ipad-multiview/44480

Test Flight Link: https://testflight.apple.com/join/kxU7lcEN

Jared Newman's PC World Article: https://lon.tv/xgwkd

ATSC 3.0 Encryption Background: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItSSUpA-DskfKKKrQ_LQYwP

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:15 - Background on the Channels App
02:00 - ATSC 3.0 Encryption Will Not Allow This Feature
02:55 - How It Works
05:45 - iPad Demo
06:18 - Channels App Source Configuration

Visit my Blog! https://blog.lon.tv

Subscribe to my ema
title: Multiview Four OTA Channels at Once on Apple TV and iPad with the Channels App Beta
